channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Power Behind the Throne
channel.description: On the new episode of Fear of a Black Dragon, @Coalhada and @jasoncordova take on *Power Behind the Throne*, part of the classic Enemy Within WHFRP campaign. It's a great dive into one of the the wildest multi-supplement campaigns out there. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/power-behind-the-throne-part-1
